entry.p: Procurement Performance Management Assessment Program (PPMAP) Self-Assessments/Internal Compliance Review
Contract Action Report, Data Verification and Validation (V&V) Certification
Competition Report, including projected competition goal for current year
Report on Pilot Program for Acquisition of Military-Purpose Nondevelopmental Items
Commercial Item Exceptions to Cost/Pricing Data valued $19.5M or more.
Truth In Negotiation Act (TINA) Waivers valued $19.5M or more.
DOE WFO Order Compliance Assessment Results
Within 30 days of the beginning of the fiscal year
Within 40 days of the beginning of the fiscal year
COTS End Items Containing Specialty Metals Report for contracts valued at $5M or more (including task orders/ delivery orders) PER ITEM
Review of Contracts Involving Combat and Security Force Training
ASN RDA memo â€œAcquisition of Contractor-Provided Combat and Security Related Training" dated 25 Nov 2009
ECMRA Contractor Service Hour Labor Reporting
No later than October 31 for the preceding fiscal year.
DOD Waivers of the Contractor Employee Compensation Cap
Consolidated Undefinitized Contract Actions (UCA) Management Plan Note: DASN(P) generates
Consolidated Undefinitized Contract Actions (UCA) Management Report
Due to DCMA not DASN(P). DASN(P) is DON liaison to DCMA if questions arise.
CAFU system in eTools at www.dcma.mil.
eSRS Status Report Note: DASN(P) will run eSRS Status Report. Field updates/inputs are required to DASN(P) by Due Date
25th of each month NMCARS is monthly. DFARS is quarterly
Synchronized Predeployment & Operational Tracker (SPOT) Plus CENTCOM Census
Note: SPOT generates an automated report for submission.
USD(ATL) Memo Policy on the Transition to & Use of an Automated Census for Contractors Supporting Operations in the USCENTCOM AOR dtd Jan 19 2010
HCA Determination to Award to Offeror Failing to Comply with Submission of Data Other Than Certified Cost or Pricing Data
Note: Send to DPC with copy to DASN(P)

conbody.p: NOTE: The line item numbers serve as pointers for administrative purposes and are subject to change as reports are added and deleted. This administrative change will not be identified in each NMCARS change issued.
